item.description:
Join us to watch the Patriots as they play the Denver Broncos!

Game Time is 4:25pm.

Please arrive by 3:30/3:40 to ensure seating for our group as this place fills up fast and we will need to nab seats all together. Even better, you will have time to settle in, order a drink and enjoy the pre-game with us!

If you've been wanting to learn more about our club and activities, to make new, down-to-earth friends or have been dying to catch up with us fun Wedelns, this is your perfect opportunity!

Playwright has great food and is littered in TVs.  See www.theplaywrightbar.com/ for address and menu. Street parking is available to non-residents on Sundays. Otherwise, it is accessible via bus and red line.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. Please maintain your own tab.

Space is very limited so please arrive early to ensure seating.

 

We can't wait to see you!  Go Pats!!  (We play well with Denver fans, too! :)
item.how_to_find_us: I will try to seat us at the tables in front of you when you first walk in.
item.name: Watch the Patriots in Southie!
